left join os_product b on a.product_id =b.id LEFT JOIN os_customer d ON d.id = a.customer_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO os_product_design( id, name, code, product_id, price, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, design_status, customer_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{code}, #{product.id}, #{price}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{designStatus}, #{customer.id} )
mapper.update: UPDATE os_product_design SET name = #{name}, code = #{code}, product_id = #{product.id}, price = #{price}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, design_status = #{designStatus} WHERE id = #{id}
